about_the_game:
A captivating blend of deckbuilding roguelike and tower defense genres. Craft your powerful deck, embark on a grand adventure through the Forest Kingdom, and wage epic battles against relentless enemy hordes.



TOWERS AND SPELLS IN THE FORM OF CARDS


Discover hidden treasures, relics of ancient power, gleaming gold, and powerful cards as you journey through the Forest Kingdom

Key Features:
  • -Deckbuilding Mastery: Craft and refine your deck of cards, each representing a unique spell or tower, to develop a winning strategy.
  • -Epic Adventures: Explore the lush and immersive Forest Kingdom, each map presenting a new tactical puzzle.
  • -Tower Defense Challenges: Defend your kingdom against hordes of cunning foes in thrilling tower defense battles.
  • -Roguelike Progression: Embrace the roguelike elements as you face perils, earn rewards, and grow stronger with each playthrough.
  • -Strategic Choices: Adapt your deck, manage resources, and make critical decisions to survive the evolving challenges.


Explore and conquer the untamed landscapes of the Forest Kingdom. Chart uncharted territories, unveil secrets, and establish your dominion in 'King Wizard of the Forest Kingdom.
